sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import Header from "./Header"; import Footer from "./Footer"; export default function ContactUs() { return (
{/* Contact Section */}
{/* Contact Form */}

Get in Touch

{/* Contact Info + Map */}

Contact Information

Email: contact@msmeconnect.com

Phone: +1 234 567 890

Our Location

{/* FAQ Section */}

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How can I become a member of MSME Connect?

A: You can become a member by filling out the registration form available on our website.

Q: What services does MSME Connect provide?

A: We offer services like business consultancy, networking, and resource access.

Q: Where is MSME Connect located?

A: Our HQ is located in the heart of the business district, easily accessible by public transport.

); }
